chart.name: Tasks Staging
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_tasks_staging', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.slave_tasks_staging', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Hosts by # Slaves Tasks Lost
Tasks Running 1w Growth %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_tasks_running', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.master_tasks_running', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().timeshift('1w').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A - B) / B * 100).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Problematic Master Tasks
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.master_tasks_failed', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.master_tasks_lost', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='B')
C = data('counter.master_tasks_error', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Resources %
chart.programText:
A = data('percent.slave_cpus_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'slave')).publish(label='A')
B = data('percent.slave_mem_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'slave')).publish(label='B')
C = data('percent.slave_disk_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'slave')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: # Hosts
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_elected', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).count(by=['host']).count().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.slave_registered', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).count(by=['host']).count().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A + B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Top Hosts by # Slaves Tasks Failed
Hosts CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.idle', filter=filter('plugin', 'aggregation') and filter('plugin_instance', 'cpu-average') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.*', filter=filter('plugin', 'aggregation') and filter('plugin_instance', 'cpu-average') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((B - A) / B * 100).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

chart.name: Slaves by Host Disk %
chart.programText:
A = data('percent.slave_disk_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Slaves by Host Memory %
chart.programText:
A = data('percent.slave_mem_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Connected vs. Active Frameworks
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_frameworks_connected', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'master')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.master_frameworks_active', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'master')).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Tasks Running 1w Growth %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_tasks_running', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.master_tasks_running', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().timeshift('1w').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A - B) / B * 100).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Hosts Disk I/O
chart.programText:
A = data('disk_ops.write', filter=filter('plugin', 'disk') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('disk_ops.read', filter=filter('plugin', 'disk') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Hosts by CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.idle', filter=filter('plugin', 'aggregation') and filter('plugin_instance', 'cpu-average') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.*', filter=filter('plugin', 'aggregation') and filter('plugin_instance', 'cpu-average') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((B - A) / B * 100).top(count=5).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Slaves by Host CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('percent.slave_cpus_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Top Hosts by Memory %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.free', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B / (A + B) * 100).top(count=5).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Problematic Slaves Tasks
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.slave_tasks_failed', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.slave_tasks_lost', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Resources %
chart.programText:
A = data('percent.master_cpus_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'master')).publish(label='A')
B = data('percent.master_mem_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'master')).publish(label='B')
C = data('percent.master_disk_percent', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos') and filter('plugin_type', 'master')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Tasks Finished
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.master_tasks_finished', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.slave_tasks_finished', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Summary
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.master_tasks_running', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.slave_registered', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='B')
C = data('gauge.master_elected', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).count(by=['host']).count().publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('gauge.slave_registered', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).count(by=['host']).count().publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (C + D).publish(label='E')
F = data('gauge.system_cpus_total', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='F')
G = data('bytes.system_mem_total_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='G')
H = data('gauge.master_slaves_connected', filter=filter('plugin', 'mesos')).sum().publish(label='H')

chart.name: Hosts Memory %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.free', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory') and filter('sf_hostHasService', 'mesos')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B / (A + B) * 100).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

dashboard.name: Mesos Master

dashboard.name: Mesos Cluster
